shareWithUs.name: ShareWithUs
shareWithUs.desc: A full-stack app for lending & borrowing items within a community. Built with the MERN stack.

shopMate.name: ShopMate
shopMate.desc: A smart shopping list app built with TypeScript, React (Vite), and Firebase. It helps users organize groceries, share lists, and stay synchronized in real-time.

cryptoApp.name: Crypto-App
cryptoApp.desc: A crypto dashboard built with React & CoinGecko API. Includes live search, charts, and local storage.

weatherApp.name: Weather-App
weatherApp.desc: An interactive weather app that shows current weather and a 5-day forecast for any city worldwide.

list.description: During my journey at HackYourFuture, I collaborated on multiple full-stack projects using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I also gained hands-on experience in Agile workflows and presented our final project, ShareWithUs.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.text: From 2015 to 2021, I worked as an Accountant in Iran. During these six years, I gained deep expertise in financial management, bookkeeping, and preparing accurate reports. These experiences shaped my ability to think critically, stay organized, and solve problems logically, skills I now apply to my career in software development.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out via email or connect with me on social media.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: You can view or download my CV below.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.text1: My name is Samira Ahmadi. I’m 36 years old, married, and currently live in Veenendaal, the Netherlands. I was born and raised in Shiraz, Iran, where I worked for several years in finance. A few years ago, I made a big decision to leave my comfort zone, move to a new country, learn a new language, and start a new career in IT.
journey.text2: This journey taught me how to stay strong when everything feels unfamiliar, how to adapt fast, and how to keep my curiosity alive. It wasn’t easy, but it shaped who I am today.
journey.text3: I’ve learned that growth doesn’t come from comfort, but from challenges and that mindset now drives me as a developer.

learning.title: What I’ve Learned
learning.text1: I studied full stack web development at HackYourFuture, a bootcamp for newcomers in the Netherlands. I learned JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, Express, and React. I discovered how much I enjoy full stack development seeing how logic and design come together to create something real.
learning.text2: In our final group project, I built the authentication system and connected frontend and backend. It was challenging, but I stayed patient, asked for help when needed, and solved it step by step.
learning.text3: Besides technical skills, I’m reliable, calm under stress, and a good communicator. I enjoy teamwork and learning from different perspectives.

goals.title: Career Goals
goals.text1: I’m passionate about full stack development because I love building complete products from backend logic to the user experience on the frontend.
goals.text2: My goal is to grow as a full stack developer in a team that values learning, collaboration, and kindness. I want to keep improving, face real challenges, and create software that makes life a bit easier for others.
